title: The printing press of yesterday today tomorrow
content: The happy Photoshoppers over at Worth1000.com are having a [competition](http://web.archive.org/web/20050520010640/http:/www.worth1000.com/cache/contest/contestcache.asp?contest_id=5905&display=photoshop) to display modern products in a vintage light. Among the entries is a delightful printing press by ‘beddie’.
author: John Hudson
